content:
Dear all,
it has been 18 months since CLAIRE was officially launched. :tada:
Read more about some key achievements and developments and brief outlook to 2020 at:
https://claire-ai.org/updates/

More information are provided in the press release. Please, feel free to distribute this press release to your media and PR contacts:
https://claire-ai.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/press-release-2019-12-18.pdf

Happy Holidays from Prague CLAIRE Office :holiday_tree:

Anna
